entry.content:
Description

Learn about a modular Python and Arduino based optical and musical environment that you can progressively adopt and develop. Learn about demonstrations of art, color theory, and music theory. See how users can express a variety of colors, patterns, musical chords, rhythms, themes, codes, and emotions. See how visitors can play along with great songs using what we promote as the "world's easiest musical instrument"!
